as.description: The element or component the ComboboxOptions should render as.
as.description_zh: ComboboxOptions 应呈现为的元素或组件。

static.description:
Whether the element should ignore the internally managed open/closed
state.
static.description_zh:
元素是否应忽略内部管理的 open/closed
州。

unmount.description:
Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the open/closed
state.
unmount.description_zh:
元素应该根据 open/closed 来卸载还是隐藏
州。

hold.description:
Whether or not the active option should stay active even when the mouse
leaves the active option.
hold.description_zh:
活动选项是否应保持活动状态，即使鼠标
保留 active 选项。

slots.name: active
slots.description: Whether or not the option is the active/focused option.
slots.description_zh: 选项是否为 active/focused 选项。

slots.name: selected
slots.description: Whether or not the option is the selected option.

slots.name: disabled
slots.description:
Whether or not the option is the disabled for keyboard navigation and ARIA
purposes.
slots.description_zh:
该选项是否对键盘导航和 ARIA 处于禁用状态
目的。
